Articles.Content:
Hello, and welcome to Quantum Industries, You are here because you want the best, and we will sacrifice as many Kerbals as we need to make it the best. We are currently recruiting Engineers and Testers. We currently specialize in Mun/Minmus Landings or Orbits, we also will make Kerbin orbiters. We use mostly stock parts, but you can PM me if you want a custom order. If you post a reply there is no certain date the rocket will get to you and we will only send you a stock version (sometimes Mechjeb). We do not affiliate ourselves with space planes... yet. So PM me if you would like to join or if you would like to request a rocket.

NOTE: We will not answer orders for interplanetary craft yet. I will update when Interplanetary Craft are available.

Pictures will be posted soon of our available craft.

Me Me!!! I wanna help!

In all seriousness if you are hiring rocketeers I would like to help you

If you want help with building rockets, i'd love to help

I can guarantee many kerbal deaths with a spacecraft/plane as a result.

Ow, and i'd love to build spaceplanes

If you want help with building rockets, i'd love to help

I can guarantee many kerbal deaths with a spacecraft/plane as a result.

Ow, and i'd love to build spaceplanes

We could use you for jumpstarting our spaceplane production. PM me if your interested.

Hello there. If you're building Spaceplanes and need some help, i can help here. I'm very good at building (space) planes. Just tell me what to do.

I think you've got now a new member in your industries!

ill'd like to test these new designs i mostly good at making basic rockets that get to minmus and the mun using mechjeb.

Im in!

Edited September 2, 2012 by Grand Lander

ill'd like to test these new designs i mostly good at making basic rockets that get to minmus and the mun using mechjeb.

Im in!

Same thing!

Hello! I would like to join Quantum Industries. I'm great at making giant rockets that (sometimes) work (but usually explode), and I can make advanced spaceplanes using Damned Robotics and Damned Aerospace. I am also good at making low-orbit space stations around planets, and interplanetary rockets. Please consider accepting me into Quantum Industries, as I think I would be a very good addition.

I would like to help Quantum Industries with my rocket designs. Well, all I could do is make really cool, nice working, fast, efficient planes and rockets, but I absolutley suck donkey bauwls at flying them. I cant even get on into orbit most of the time. But iv posted before and got someone to Minimus with it so the rockets are good!
I'd love to help! I can test rockets or build ones that hit the sun regularly, (If they dont explode on the pad...)

And that was the horrible end of the first spaceplane of quantum industries

http://imgur.com/XgkpI
Can I help! i just have a good all round construction knowlege.

How to write PMs?

I would like to be a tester!

I could test how Good the Crafts are controllable when you havent got high framerates...
